title: Two guides to a good life The genealogy of vertue and the nathomy of sinne. Liuely displaying the worth of one, and the vanity of the other.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656, attributed name.
notes: Another edition, with cancel title page, of: The anathomie of sinne; sometimes attributed to Joseph Hall or to Richard Humfrey.
"Sinne" bound first. Imperfect: lacks I2 of "Sinne".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
